channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Hey, I'm using Sanitys client, and everytime I open it up this is what it says in the CMD box.
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225[/code]
The client runs fine for me, but other people can't connect. All help is appreciated. :)

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Hey, I’m using Sanitys client, and everytime I open it up this is what it says in the CMD box.

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225

The client runs fine for me, but other people can’t connect. All help is appreciated.
